reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Operating the Artificial Limbs and Rehabilitation Center in Marib Governorate (Phase VI).

description.narrative: 1- Raising the capabilities of the medical and technical staff professionally and scientifically and preparing them to deal with specific cases and limiting the migration of medical and technical cadres specialized in the localization and improvement of prosthetic and rehabilitation services 2- Assisting people with special needs by engaging them in social life and maintaining their continued performance within the elements of civil society 3- Raising the capabilities of workers in the prosthetics center with the latest medical sciences

Providing physical rehabilitation services for people with special needs, installing all kinds of prosthetic limbs, providing functional rehabilitation service for prosthetic limbs, and following up on them

participating-org.narrative: International Society for War and Disaster Victims Care
King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
